reviewText: We love all Mike Holmes Books!!!  Great information.

This made an amazing christmas gift for my father. He loves mike holmes and he has already seen these episodes but he can now watch it over and over when its not on tv, which has been alot lately! It was the best gift idea i came up with. I got it very fast with my prime shipping and it was brand new in the package, just as it said in the listing. Makes a great gift!!!
Mike Holmes is my "Do It Right" hero for my DIY projects.

BEWARE! Everything on this dvd is included in the 5 seasons available in the US. NO NEW EPISODES! It's just a stand alone 'Christmas Special' dvd. Meh just for that.

Now if they'd just release season 6 & 7 in the US...

Great story!  This family had been through the "ringer" with renovation nightmares.  Mike Holmes came in to give this family back their home, the way it should have been.  And he was able to get it done before Christmas so the family could have a nice Christmas in their own home.

Home for the Holidays is where he takes on a complete remodel of a very large house where the previous contractor ran with the money. Although it is well worth seeing if you bought the collections this is already in one of those - I think #4
